projectPlan.description: Set up the React frontend with basic components (Quiz, Result). Implement question display and answer submission.

projectPlan.phase: Phase 2: Backend Development and API Integration
projectPlan.description: Develop the Node.js/Express backend to serve quiz questions and store scores (optional). Integrate the frontend with the backend API.
Thoroughly test the application. Deploy the frontend to a platform like Netlify or Vercel, and the backend to a platform like Heroku or AWS.

stackReasoning: JavaScript is ideal because it allows for full-stack development with React and Node.js. React provides a component-based approach for building the UI, while Node.js/Express offers a robust backend environment. This stack is efficient for rapid development and deployment of interactive web applications.
